translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     ((udom \<rightarrow> udom) \<rightarrow>
      udom\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'f,
      ('a \<rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow>
      'a\<cdot>'f \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>
    fmapU\<cdot>
    f\<cdot>
    (COERCE(udom\<cdot>'f, 'a\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>zeroU) =
    COERCE(udom\<cdot>'f, 'b\<cdot>'f)\<cdot>zeroU

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bindU =
    COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'a \<rightarrow>
      (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'a) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'a,
      udom\<cdot>'a \<rightarrow>
      (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'a) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'a)\<cdot>
    bindU

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mzero \<bind> k = mzero

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. COERCE
     (udom\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
      (udom \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> udom\<cdot>'m,
      'a\<cdot>'m \<rightarrow>
      ('a \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m) \<rightarrow> 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>
    bindU\<cdot>
    (COERCE(udom\<cdot>'m, 'a\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>zeroU)\<cdot>
    k =
    COERCE(udom\<cdot>'m, 'b\<cdot>'m)\<cdot>zeroU
